TRttiPropertyHelper Class Helper

Summary

Extends TRttiProperty for easier RTTI use.

Namespace: DUnitX.Utils
Syntax
Delphi
type
 TRttiPropertyHelper = class helper for TRttiProperty
 end;
Methods
 NameDescription
TryGetValue(Pointer,TValue)

Retrieves the value of the property and returns if this was successful.

TrySetValue(Pointer,TValue)

Sets the value of the property and returns if this was successful.
